column1: Stimuli
She likes apples.
Jim was born in California.
The dog is alive.
The cat chases the mouse.
I have a car.
The boy is playing soccer.
Jim showed the man his tickets.
Steve went to New York.
The kids go to the mall.
The man has forgotten to do his homework.
The mansion has ten rooms.
The tea in the kettle is done brewing.
The teacher assigned homework for the week.
I ran into my classmate at the mall.
I called Anna twice today.
This wedding ceremony was held outdoors.
The soccer game was very exciting.
The trash is overflowing in my apartment.
My dog weighs ten pounds.
The tree in my backyard has green leaves.
My sister told me to walk the dog.
The books on the shelf are all hard cover.
The school bus comes on time.
Friendship is very important to Sarah.
The baseball cap helps keep the sun off my face.
I drove to the store to buy some milk.
